## Import.FsItem.getContext() method

Gets the context for this file system item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getContext(): Result<ImportContext>;
```
**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ImportContext](./ts-res.import.importcontext.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` containing the [import context](./ts-res.import.importcontext.md) for this item if successful, or a `Failure` containing an error message if an error occurs.
